descriptionHtml:
Fantasy Weapons

If you have the time to download, please have the time to endorse :) enjoy

Update V3:
Sarumans Staff
Orc Edge
Greatsword Orc Edge
Sword of Sharpness
Alduins fang
Alduins claw
Alduins tongue
Parthurnax fang
Paladin Sword 

Update V2:
Dragon bone scythe
Dragon bone Sword

Have now been added...

I will be constantly adding new weapons to this mod...so if you like it and enjoy the weapons please endorse so that others may see it too..thanks for downloading..

Install:

Just drag contents into your data folder steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/data

MAKE SURE YOU ACTIVATE THE PLUGIN IN DATA FILES WHEN YOU OPEN SKYRIM

You can get these weapons ingame at the forge or simply open the console using \"~\" or \"`\" (without \") and type
(to scroll up in console use Page up and Page down)
help anduril 4
help agito 4
help dragonslayer 4
help tongue 4
help fang 4
help claw 4
help saruman 4
help paladin 4
help edge 4
help sharpness 4

then a list will appear next to WEAP Anduril you will see a code then type  

Player.additem \"code\".... example: playeradditem 696aba01
author: DigitalLion
